title: Textile
medium:
Block-printed on linen
Medium: linen 
Technique: woodblock-printed; plain weave foundation
description: Hand-woven linen with block-printed images in black and dull red-orange.  Design shows two horsemen, confronted, one with spear, one with staff. Above each man an inscription in Russian (inversed, mirror writing).  Fragment is pieced across.
name: Textile
